group.label: Spin/Temp
group.vc: exists('SetupDefault1','parameter'):$SetupDefault1 if ($SetupDefault1<0.5) then create('SetupDefault1') vnmrinfo('get','spinExpControl'):SetupDefault1 endif exists('SetupDefault2','parameter'):$SetupDefault2 if ($SetupDefault2<0.5) then create('SetupDefault2') vnmrinfo('get','tempExpControl'):SetupDefault2 endif
group.vc2: exists('SetupDefault1','parameter'):$SetupDefault1 if ($SetupDefault1>0.5) then destroy('SetupDefault1') endif exists('SetupDefault2','parameter'):$SetupDefault2 if ($SetupDefault2>0.5) then destroy('SetupDefault2') endif
